description: Amendments to planning permission dated 14 August 2020 (RN: 18/10588/FULL) for, 'Demolition of existing building and redevelopment to provide a new building comprising basement,  ground and first to eighth floors. Use of part basement and ground floors for dual/alternative retail (Class A1) or restaurant (Class A3) purposes, use of the remainder of the property as up to 37 flats (Class C3), ancillary residential amenity, cycle parking; provision of photovoltaic cells, a green roof and associated plant'; NAMELY, replacement of Condition 20 (waste storage arrangements); option to provide one unit for dual/alternative retail (Class A1) or restaurant (Class A3) purposes and one unit for Class A1 retail purposes at part basement and ground floor levels; alterations to the residential mix (increasing the proportion of 2 bed units); addition of pavement break-out panel, rearrangement of rooftop plant; replacement of glass balustrade to the roof perimeters with acoustic balustrades and metal railing to the private residential roofs.
